Text: EAcom Welcome JayWelcome Jay Thanks for creating an EAcom member account Your member name is jreitme To start playing just go to now Now that you are a member you have access to our great free games and can get your high scores on our leaderboards for all to see Over the next few months well be adding more features and more games Plus as a member youll be the first to know about them PRIVACY POLICY EA knows that community is built on trust We regard our members privacy as one of our most important values Our ESRB Privacy Online Certified Policy gives you confidence whenever you play EA games To view our complete Privacy Policy go to EAcom the place to play
